name: Zeplin
title: zeplin.io
shortDescription: Zeplin is a design delivery platform tailored for teams of varying sizes. It facilitates seamless transitions from design to development by providing tools for effective communication, collaboration, and integration. Teams can manage projects, link designs to code, and secure approvals efficiently. An example use case is a software development team using Zeplin to streamline the handoff from designers to developers, ensuring all stakeholders are aligned with the project goals.
pros: Integrates with tools like Jira and GitHub
cons: May require learning curve for new users
Potential cost barrier for small teams
